cu.explanation_en: Setting the PDCP log level to an invalid value 'invalid' will cause logging configuration errors and prevent proper PDCP layer log output.

du.explanation_en: Setting the PDSCH antenna ports N1 to an out-of-range value of 8 will cause antenna configuration errors and prevent downlink transmission.
du.explanation_zh: 將 PDSCH 天線埠 N1 設定為超出範圍的值 8，會導致天線配置錯誤，並阻止下行鏈路傳輸。
